entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:10 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -42.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 06:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -42.3°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -47.4°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming east 20 this morning. High minus 39. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 46.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 46. Wind chill near minus 61. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
